2. Use a sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner 2-3 times a week, rinsing with lukewarm or cool water.
3. Air dry your hair and use heat-free styling techniques.
4. Use styling products with minimal ingredients.
How To Find Out when Someone Died:
1. Search the person's full name online for newspaper obituaries.
2. Add extra information (e.g., birth town) to filter out less relevant results.
3. Include keywords like "death index" or "death records" in your search.
4. Use genealogy sites (e.g., Ancestry.com) for ancestors who lived hundreds of years ago.
How To Start a Home Staging Business:
1. Stage your own home by rearranging furniture, painting walls, and adding unique decorations.
2. Update the lighting if necessary.
3. Take pictures of the staged rooms.
4. Post the pictures on social media and show them to friends and family to attract clients.
How To Recognize Trichomoniasis Symptoms:
1. Look for abnormal vaginal discharge with a strong odor or greenish-yellow and frothy appearance.
2. Check for redness, burning, and itching in the genitals.
3. If symptoms persist for more than a few days or cause discomfort during sex, seek a doctor for STI testing.
4. Avoid all forms of sexual intercourse until cleared by a physician.
How To Set Up a Hookah:
1. Pour cold water into the vase and insert the shaft.
2. Connect the hoses to the sides of the shaft and place the metal tray on top.
3. Break up tobacco and put it in the bowl, covering it with foil and poking holes through with a toothpick.
4. Light coals and place them on top of the foil.
5. Wait 5 minutes for the hookah to warm up before smoking.
How To Make Vegetable Glycerin:
1. Combine 1 cup of coconut oil and 1 cup of olive oil, and heat them together over the stove.
2. Mix 2 tablespoons of lye with 1 cup of water, then add it to the heated oils and heat for 20 minutes until it reaches 125 degrees Fahrenheit.
3. Reduce heat and stir the ingredients until they thicken.
4. Add ½ cup of salt and let it cool.
How To Make Khichdi:
1. Soak rice and dal in water for 30 minutes.
2. Toast mustard and cumin seeds in ghee, then add pepper, curry leaves, hing, onion, ginger-garlic paste, and vegetables, followed by the spices.
3. Combine the rice and dal mixture with enough water to cover it in a pressure cooker.
4. Cook until the water has been absorbed.
5. Make the tadka topping by sautéing cumin, chilis, and garlic in melted ghee, then pour it over the khichdi.
How To Gain Weight if You Are Underweigh:
1. Eat 5-6 smaller meals throughout the day, adding 200-500 calories to your normal amount.
2. Incorporate protein-dense dishes into your meals.
3. Engage in weight training exercises a few times a week to increase muscle mass and boost appetite.
How To Make Concrete:
1. Mix 2 parts all-purpose sand with 1 part limestone cement in a wheelbarrow or cement mixture.
2. Add 4 parts of gravel or crushed brick to the mixture.
3. Slowly add water and mix until the concrete is stiff.
4. Thoroughly clean your mixing tools to prevent the concrete from hardening on them.
How To Train a Horse to Walk Through Wat:
1. Lay a tarp on the ground with an orange cone at each corner.
2. Lead the horse across the tarp several times, going back and forth.
3. Move the cones to a shallow body of water (about 3-feet deep) and practice walking the horse across it.
4. Gradually expose the horse to deeper waters, up to the middle of its chest.
How To Organize Your Fridge:
1. Remove all contents from the fridge and discard unwanted or expired items.
2. Clean the shelves, drawers, and walls with warm, soapy water.
3. Place drinks, leftovers, and ready-to-eat foods on the upper shelves.
4. Store raw foods on the lower shelves.
5. Store fruits and vegetables in the vegetable crisper drawers.
6. Place condiments in the fridge door.
7. Use dividers, bins, and baskets to group similar items together.
How To Make Rice Krispie Buns:
1. Melt 1 cup of milk chocolate and 1/2 cup of butter over a double boiler or in the microwave.
2. Stir 4 cups of Rice Krispies into the melted mixture.
3. Divide the batter between cupcake liners.
4. Chill the Rice Krispie buns in the fridge for 1 hour before serving.
How To Check a Cat's Temperature:
1. Have someone help you keep the cat still and calm.
2. Hold the cat's head and insert the digital ear thermometer horizontally into the ear canal.
3. Remove the thermometer when it beeps and check the reading.
4. If the reading is below 99° F or above 104° F, call your veterinarian.
How To Stay a Virgin:
1. Define your personal boundaries by considering your emotional and physical comfort levels.
2. Communicate your values and boundaries clearly when dating someone.
3. If your partner doesn't respect your boundaries, end the relationship amicably.
4. If you feel uncomfortable with physical contact at any point, express your desire to stop or slow down.
How To Start Your Own Magazine:
1. Decide on the magazine's theme and target audience.
2. Build a team of writers, photographers, and graphic designers.
3. Choose a reputable printer with reasonable costs and good experience.
How To Heal Cracked Skin:
1. Check the cracks for signs of infection and seek medical attention if necessary.
2. Soak your feet in a mixture of 1 gallon of warm water and 1 cup of apple cider vinegar.
3. Apply a lanolin-based moisturizer immediately after soaking.
4. Fill the cracks with Neosporin and wrap them in cotton pads and gauze during the day.
How To Make a Sponge Cake:
1. Heat egg yolks and sugar in a double boiler, whisking constantly, until the sugar is dissolved.
2. Beat the yolk mixture for 3-5 minutes, then stir in vanilla and salt.
3. Beat egg whites until soft peaks form, then fold them into the yolk mixture.
4. Sift flour over the top and fold it in, followed by melted butter, until the batter is smooth.
5. Spread the batter into buttered pans and bake at 350°F for 25 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
How To Memorize a Speech in One Night:
1. Write out the speech to help commit it to memory.
2. Focus on remembering key points, facts, and statistics.
3. Rehearse in front of a friend, family member, or record yourself to identify areas for improvement.
How To Grow Onions:
1. Choose a roomy planting location with plenty of sunlight.
2. Till the soil, add manure, and amend it to a pH level between 6 and 7.5.
3. Plant seeds or bulbs ¼ to ½ inch deep and 4 to 6 inches apart.
4. Provide 1 inch of water per week, and supplement with nitrogen fertilizer once a month.
5. Mulch lightly around each plant to lock in moisture and block weeds.
How To Choose a Litter Box for Your Cat:
1. Choose a litter box that is large enough for your cat to fit its whole body in and turn around.
2. Select a litter box with a surface your cat prefers, such as tiles with a small amount of litter.
3. Place the litter box in an active area of your house, away from food and loud noises.
How To Lose 5 Pounds in 5 Weeks:
1. Create a meal plan and grocery list with lean protein and plenty of fruits and vegetables.
2. Record your food intake in a food journal to stay on track.
3. Perform at least 150 minutes of cardio exercise per week through activities like dancing, hiking, jogging, or biking.
How To Clean Dry Erase Erasers:
1. Soak the eraser in hot water and dish soap for 20 minutes.
2. Alternatively, spray the eraser with a garden hose to remove the ink.
3. For extra dirty erasers, scrub with toothpaste and a wet washcloth before hosing off.
4. Dry the eraser in the sun before using it again.
How To Play Capitalism:
1. Deal a regular deck of cards among all players.
2. Place a card face-up on the table, then go clockwise with each player placing a higher card; if unable to play, say "Pass."
3. After the first round, assign titles: President (first out), Vice President (second), Vice Scum (third), and Scum (fourth), and have players sit in order of their titles.
4. For each future round, the Scum shuffles and deals the cards, then gives their 2 highest cards to the President, who gives them 2 cards of their choice.
5. Award points: 2 to the President and 1 to the Vice President each round.
6. Continue until a player reaches 11 points, declaring them the winner.
How To Know Your Horoscope:
1. Check which of the 12 zodiac signs your birthday falls under to determine your star sign.
2. Look for your horoscope in a daily newspaper, online publication, or popular weekly magazine.
3. Apply the advice from your horoscope to your daily life as a motivational tool.
How To Spin a Bowling Ball:
1. Find your pocket and grip the ball strongly.
2. Bend your hand forward, cradling the ball between your palm and inner wrist.
3. Swing back with a straight arm and wrist.
4. Release the ball with your thumb first and rotate your hand slightly from the wrist to add spin.
5. Follow through by moving your arm upward and forward toward the pocket.
How To Become a Sportscaster:
1. Take journalism courses in high school.
2. Record yourself calling games at sporting events to practice and review.
3. Enroll in a college with a 4-year program in journalism, broadcasting, and television production.
4. Find a sports broadcasting internship or student program for hands-on experience.
How To Heal after Arthroscopic Knee Surg:
1. Elevate your leg on pillows while resting to improve blood circulation.
2. Apply ice to your knee for 15 minutes every few hours for the first couple of days.
3. Rest your leg and avoid strenuous activity for the first few days.
4. Use crutches to get around for a few weeks to reduce pressure on your knee.
How To Lose Fat Around the Fingers:
1. Eat less salt to reduce water retention and swelling.
2. Drink 8 glasses of water daily to help eliminate excess salt.
3. Perform cardio and strength training exercises 3 times a week for overall weight loss.
How To Fight Nausea:
1. Get some fresh air by opening windows or stepping outside.
2. Consume ginger, such as ginger candies or grated ginger in hot water.
3. Eat mild, easy-to-digest snacks like crackers, plain rice, or a banana.
4. Take small, frequent sips of water or a sports drink to stay hydrated.

How To Lose 60 Pounds:
1. Follow a dietary plan that reduces your caloric intake by 500 to 1,000 calories a day.
2. Eat healthy, balanced meals and avoid unhealthy snacks like soda, chips, and candy.
3. Exercise consistently, choosing low-impact workouts like walking or swimming if you're new to exercise.
How To Make Simple Meatballs:
1. Mix 1 egg with your desired seasonings (e.g., oregano, garlic powder, cracked red pepper, and thyme) in a bowl.
2. Combine the egg mixture with 1 pound of raw ground meat in a separate bowl.
3. Add ½ cup of grated Parmesan cheese and 1 cup of breadcrumbs, then knead everything together.
4. Form the mixture into 1-inch balls.
5. Cook the meatballs in olive oil or sauce over medium heat until browned on all sides, or bake in the oven at 350 Fahrenheit for 20 to 30 minutes.
How To Get Rid of Ringworm in Dogs:
1. Take your dog to the vet to obtain oral and topical medications.
2. Quarantine your dog in a room that's easy to clean.
3. Wipe down the room's surfaces with a diluted bleach solution twice a week.
4. Wash your hands before and after touching your dog.
How To Cook Sirloin Tip Roast:
1. Layer potatoes, carrots, and onions at the bottom of the slow cooker.
2. Place the sirloin tip roast on top of the vegetables and sprinkle with garlic powder and pepper.
3. Cook on high for 2 hours, then continue on low for 4-6 hours (or cook on low for 8 hours).
4. Cut the roast into pieces across the grain to serve.
How To Go to the Beach on Your Period:
1. Wear a tampon or menstrual cup for swimming.
2. Eat hydrating fruits like watermelon and berries to reduce cramping and bloating.
3. Set up near a bathroom for easy access to change or check for leaking.

How To Make Chili Oil:
1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add 2 teaspoons of chili flakes and 2-3 whole dried chilis, and stir until they sizzle.
3. Pour in 1 more cup of oil and heat until warm to the touch.

How To Disguise Yourself:

2. Wear a realistic-looking wig for a quick change in appearance.
3. Choose baggy or old-trend clothes to help you blend in.

How To Use Ninja Blender:
1. Attach the pitcher to the base and place the stacked blade assembly onto the shaft.
2. Plug in the blender and press the "Release" button to open and remove the lid.
3. Add the ingredients to the pitcher.
4. Choose the desired speed: "Pulse" to chop, speed 1 to mix, speed 2 to blend, or speed 3 to chop ice.
How To Make a Fishtail Braid:
1. Separate your hair into two equal sections and bring them to the same side of your head.
2. Use your index finger to separate a small section of hair from one of the bigger sections and pass it over into the opposite section.
3. Continue separating small sections of hair from the outer edges of the bigger sections and passing them over into the opposite section until you reach the ends of your hair.
4. Use a hair tie to hold the end of the fishtail braid in place.
How To Introduce a New Cat to the Family:
1. Keep the new cat in one room for a few days after bringing it home.
2. Allow children to visit the cat in short, calm, and quiet sessions.
3. Swap the new cat's and other pets' scents using old t-shirts.
4. Gradually let the cat explore more rooms once it seems more comfortable.
How To Cool Yourself in a Car Without Ai:
1. Freeze damp rags, drape them over the AC vents, and turn on the fan.
2. Use a 12-volt fan plugged into the cigarette lighter for extra airflow.
3. Place a cold water bottle or rag on the back of your neck, under your knees, or on your wrist for quick cooling.
How To Avoid Feeling Drowsy After Lunch:
1. Eat a smaller lunch to avoid feeling tired.
2. Choose a healthy meal with fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
3. Engage in physical activity, such as a quick walk or stretches, after lunch.
How To Make a Long Slip and Slide:
1. Spread 100 feet of heavy-duty plastic sheeting on a grassy area and fold it in half lengthwise.
2. Anchor the sides every five feet using landscape anchor pins, ensuring they are flush with the ground.
3. Add dish soap to the center of the slide.

How To Salt Nuts:
1. Soak raw nuts in water with 1 tablespoon of sea salt for the recommended time.
2. Drain the nuts and arrange them in a single layer on a baking sheet.
3. Bake in a 150°F oven, checking occasionally, until the nuts are dry.
4. Allow the nuts to cool.
How To Stop Your Cuticle Skin from Peeli:

2. Apply petroleum jelly or essential oils like orange or tea tree oil to your cuticles to soften them.

1. Eat soft foods, such as fruit smoothies or mashed potatoes, in the first few days.
2. Eat cold foods, like ice cream or popsicles, to dull the pain and soreness.
3. Eat slowly and carefully, cutting food into small pieces.
4. Avoid hard or extremely crunchy foods that can damage your braces.
How To Cash Savings Bonds:
1. Use the US Treasury Department's bond value calculator to determine the bond's worth.
2. Go to a bank that cashes savings bonds and follow their process to complete the transaction.
3. Alternatively, open a TreasuryDirect account and use the SMART Exchange program to convert the bond into an electronic security and deposit the value into your bank account.
How To Be a Drag Queen:
1. Choose a persona for your drag alter-ego, including name, personality, and voice.
2. Create the drag look by taping your pecs and wearing a padded bra, then select a fitting outfit and wig.

How To Get a Bigger Butt in a Week:

2. Eat more carbs, such as sweet potatoes and whole grain bread.
